## ZoteroKeyTool.registerKey() method

Register a Zotero key in preferences.

Requires restarting Zotero to take effects.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerKey(type: "prefs", keyOptions: {
        id: string;
        key: string;
    }): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | "prefs" |  |
|  keyOptions | { id: string; key: string; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
